channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Pointless Celebrities
channel.desc: A special edition of the general knowledge quiz with four teams of celebrities who aimto lift the Pointless trophy. They are Harriet Kemsley, Bobby Mair, Penny Smith, Bonnie Langford, Adam Gemili, Alice Tai MBE, Ricky Groves, and Balvinder Sopal.
